title: Chicken Vegetable and Peanut Soup
ingredients: ['2 litres chicken stock', '275g diced, cooked chicken meat', '150g peeled and cubed potatoes', '125g diced carrots', '125g diced courgette', '90g broccoli florets', '240g tinned whole tomatoes, chopped', '60g chopped celery', '80g chopped onion', '75g chopped green pepper', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '130g peanut butter', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste']
